2: <mistake>pa'o//srid</mistake> pa'i rgyam <mistake>tsho'i</mistake> <mistake>pha</mistake> rol du <mistake>'gro ba</mistake> rnams kyi grur gyur <mistake>pa'o//nad</mistake> thams cad nges par <mistake>'doms</mistake> pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal <mistake>bchen</mistake> <mistake>po</mistake> <mistake>rgyur</mistake> pa'o // blang bar <mistake>bya ba</mistake> dang dor bar bya <mistake>ba'i</mistake> <mistake>dngs</mistake> po
3: rnam <mistake>par</mistake> dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur <mistake>pa'o// lta</mistake> <mistake>bangan</mistake> pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye <mistake>sheb</mistake> <mistake>kyi</mistake> <mistake>grnang</mistake> bar gyur <mistake>pa'o //sams</mistake> can <mistake>thams</mistake> cad <mistake>kyi</mistake> bsam pa <mistake>dang/'dod</mistake> pa ji
4: <mistake>shUM lta</mistake> ba bzhin du yongs <mistake>surdzogs</mistake> pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur <mistake>pa'o//'dam</mistake> dpal <mistake>gyi</mistake> <mistake>e</mistake> shes kyi <mistake>skurab</mistake> tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad <mistake>mbyen</mistake> pa'i ye shes su <mistake>gyar</mistake> <mistake>pa'o/ /sbpyan</mistake> lnga rab tu thob pa'i
5: <mistake>1aphyir</mistake> yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur <mistake>pa'o//zang</mistake> zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur ba'o // bsod nams
6: <mistake>/dang</mistake> ye shes kyi tshogs dang <mistake>tang</mistake> nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis <mistake>s</mistake> bcur <mistake>batu</mistake> <mistake>rob</mistake> par gyur <mistake>pa'o//gnyis</mistake> kyi chos <mistake>pang</mistake> bral ba'i phyir gnyis su <mistake>me d</mistake> pa'i chos nyid <mistake>do//lhag</mistake> par sgro 'dogs pa
7: dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang <mistake>gzhan</mistake> ma yin pa'i chos nyid <mistake>do//de</mistake> <mistake>bzhn</mistake> gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i
8: <mistake>/rang</mistake> bzhin nyid <mistake>do// lta</mistake> <mistake>bdan</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> tshang <mistake>thond</mistake> ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid <mistake>kyirang</mistake> bzhin nyid <mistake>do//mtshan</mistake> yang dag <mistake>par</mistake> brjod pa <mistake>'de ni</mistake> <mistake>'di</mistake> ltar gnyis su
